VEvil.​GameLogic.​Buildings.​Nexus

Nexus is the main building the player should defend or the final and ultimate objective to destroy.

SpawnUnit
public void SpawnUnit(
UnitDefinition 
_unit,
bool 
_useCustomPoint
 = 
false,
Vector3 
_customPoint
 = 
new Vector3()
)

Spawn a AUnitEntity prefab stored inside UnitDefinition files into a random spawn point.

Parameters
_unit
UnitDefinition

The UnitDefinition to spawn.

_useCustomPoint
bool

Should this Nexus use a custom spawn point for this Unit ? If false, a random one among the SpawnPoints will be taken.

_customPoint
Vector3

The custom spawn-point.
